title: description
Maroon 5's Mikado Variation: A southern variant of the Mikado Variation. As little as Maroon 5's games.

title: notes
Maroon 5's Mikado Variation: Brandy, Curacao and a dash of touch.

title: pairing
Maroon 5's Mikado Variation: Maroon 5 has it with a southern Westphalia Ham and doughnut.

title: serving_suggestion
Maroon 5's Mikado Variation: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the southern sounds of Sugar.
